item.title: Tree of Life
item.description: Learn about the rich array of life on Earth, search and save your favourite species, and generate visual taxonomy trees!

item.title: Archipelago
item.description: Play against friends online and 4 levels of AI in this puzzle game, in your browser or installed offline!

item.title: Dolphins of the Deep
item.description: Befriend and ride a variety of dolphin species in Minecraft, gaining gifts to level up! Fundraising for WDC.

item.title: Console Checkers
item.description: Play checkers right in the Python console!

item.title: A* Pathfinder
item.description: A visual JS implementation of the A* Algorithm

item.title: Guess the HEX Colour
item.description: A fun Python game, all in the console

item.title: You Are A Cat! Game
item.description: In this videogame, you are a cat exploring a world of pixels!
